text: The Stone Flower () is a 1946 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Ptushko.Мастер киносказок: «Москино» приглашает посмотреть фильмы Александра ПтушкоКаменный цветок (1946) It stars Vladimir Druzhnikov, Yekaterina Derevshchikova, and Tamara Makarova. ==Actors== * Vladimir Druzhnikov as Danilo * Yekaterina Derevshchikova as Katinka * Tamara Makarova as The Mistress of the Copper Mountain * Mikhail Troyanovsky as Prokopych * Aleksandr Kleberer as The Old Storyteller Slyshko * Vitaly Kravchenko as Young Danilo == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1946 movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ptushko
title: The Stone Flower (1946 movie)
